channel.title: CVE Feed for Grup Arge Energy and Control Systems -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Grup Arge Energy and Control Systems -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-0851|2024-05-27T14:23:57.642Z -- Grup Arge Energy and Control Systems -- Smartpower
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Grup Arge Energy and Control Systems Smartpower allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Smartpower: through V24.05.27.
